name: Japan Claw Machine（JCM）
description:
Made in JAPAN app !

A game center that exists in the foot of Mt. Fuji "Shizuoka"

Video distribution with webcam !

Remote control of real machine with smartphone !

Play crane games and catcher games anytime and anywhere !

More than 1000 kinds of items, every month !

You can enjoy the game while staying at home !

Anyone can play over 20 machines as "FREE PLAY" !

--- What's JCM ? ---

Your smartphone turns into a game center in Japan !

Press the button and move the claw to aim and pick your favorite prize.

■Operator helps you during play.
（If you have difficulty moving items.）

・Send a message from an inquiry.

・The operator is responding for 24 hours.

・The exchange is displayed in chat format.

・May help you get prizes.

Same operating game center in Japan !

■Unique item lineup

Not only figures and plush dolls, but also "和 Japanese Style Goods" are available.

Miniatures of "Japan's GACHA Machine"

Yu-Gi-Oh card

Japanese Comics Set such as "DRAGONBALL" and "ONE PIECE"

Towel or bag printed with "NARUTO" or "POKEMON"

Limited goods such as "GHIBLI" and "DORAEMON"

Plastic models and RC cars of "TAMIYA" and "BANDAI"

Used items of Japanese collectors

Snack food or Cup Noodles, and more !!!
